alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 6:03PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Otero and southeastern Crowley Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 602 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rocky Ford, or 11 miles northwest of La Junta, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Swink around 615 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include La Junta, North La Junta and Cheraw. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County
